text: The List of Japan women's international footballers is evolving. The history of the team is created by its players. Japan women's national football team, also known as , is a Japanese women's association football team. The team represents Japan in international competition.Hongo, Jun, "Nadeshiko Japan eyes London Olympic gold ", Japan Times, 24 January 2012, p. 3. ==List== Update; December 31, 2020 *Riko Ueki
